item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello, my name is Scott Westover and I am a Fullstack Developer who loves coding, writing tutorials, participating in game jams, and learning about new technologies. When I am not coding, I enjoy spending time with my wife and two kids. Scott is looking to form connections and share his knowledge. You can connect with me on Linkedin here

item.title: Kontra.js v7.0.0 Released
item.description: The newest version of Kontra.js brings some breaking changes as well as a bunch of new features. Some of the new features include: TypeScript support New GameObject class that is now the parent of the Sprite class Button - allows you to create accessible buttons for your game Text - allows you to write text to the canvas Scene - helps you organize the different parts of your game and much more!
